dmca.title: Music DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: 

We have run across multiple blogs that are linking to copy written material not only ours, but many others. Here are the 2 blogs in question www.deadend-hebag.blogspot.com and http://ofintellegence.blogspot.com I'm sure everything on there is pirated, but what directly concerns me is the albums that are on our label, the permalinks are: 

Rocket Scientists "Revolution Road" 
http://ofintelligence.blogspot.com/2007/05/rocket-scientists-revolution-road-2006.html 

The Third Ending "The Third Ending" 
http://deadend-hebag.blogspot.com/2007/O5/third-ending.html 

Sylvan "Presets"
http://deadend-hebag.blogspot.com/2007/07/sylvan_31.html 

Sylvan "Posthumous Silence"
http://deadend-hebag.blogspot.com/2007/O7/sylvan.html 
Sylvan "Encounters" 
http://deadend-hebag.blogspot.com/2007/O5/sylvan.html

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

Sincerely Yours,
[private]10/18/2007
[private]
